name: Stupid Goat Game | Crazy Funny Simulator Games For Free
name_original: Stupid Goat Game | Crazy Funny Simulator Games For Free
description:
NEW SIMULATOR GAME WITH GOATS
A crazy animal simulation game for children.

In this new goats game version, zombies have invaded your farm and are attacking the animals. You're a superhero goat and you have to escape away from the zombies that will fight you to attack the farm.

EVIL GOAT SIMULATOR
Your goat is very angry and you will do everything necessary to win this fight against the zombie attack.

GOATS RACE AGAINST ZOMBIES
Run with your goat all you can in this funny race against the zombies in your farm.

Try this new game is very addictive and you can not stop running.

Features:
- Realistic scenario in an animal farm
- Zombies 3D runners
- Realistic Goat can run and dodge enemies
- Animal sounds
- Music accompanying action
- Strategy game fun

Download it now and start the fun!
